title: View resource offering property references
content:
To view reference to a resource offering property, go to the Properties tab for a resource offering, and then click View References for the property.

Reference Types

  • Service Designs: Click the design link to view the design containing these references.
  • Component Templates: Click the template link to view the template containing these references.
  • Lifecycle Actions: Go to the Lifecycle tab to view these references.
  • User Operations: Go to the User Operations tab to view these references.
